mapper.select: select bidx ,boriginbidx ,bdepth ,blvl ,blist ,bcategory ,btitle ,bwriter ,bcontent ,bwdate ,brewdate ,bstate ,bmdate ,bdelete ,bsecret ,bhit ,MIDX from table_board where bidx = #{bidx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TABLE_LIKE (likeno, like_check, pidx , midx) VALUES((SELECT * FROM (SELECT MAX(likeno)+1 from TABLE_LIKE) next), #{like_check}, #{pidx},#{midx})
mapper.update: DELETE from TABLE_LIKE where MIDX=#{midx} AND PIDX=#{pidx}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TABLE_LIKE WHERE PIDX = #{pidx} and MIDX = #{midx}
